TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AssemblyContextControlItem extends System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem

Docs.summary: Exposes an Item through the editing context for managing the list of referenced and local assemblies that will be used inside the workflow for controls such as the expression editor to determine the list of references.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Returns a collection that contains the display names of all the assemblies that have been loaded in the environment in addition to the display name of the local project assembly.
Docs.value: A collection that contains the display names of all the assemblies that have been loaded in the environment in addition to the display name of the local project assembly.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Reflection.Assembly GetAssembly (System.Reflection.AssemblyName assemblyName, System.Activities.Presentation.Hosting.IMultiTargetingSupportService multiTargetingService);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Reflection.Assembly GetAssembly(class System.Reflection.AssemblyName assemblyName, class System.Activities.Presentation.Hosting.IMultiTargetingSupportService multiTargetingService) cil managed

Docs.param: The multi-targeting service used to get the proper version of the loaded assembly that corresponds to the target [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] of the current project.
Docs.summary: Returns the currently loaded assembly using the multi-targeting support service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If `multiTargetingService` is `null`, this method loads the assembly from the specified assembly name.

Docs.param: The multi-targeting service used to get the proper versions of the loaded assemblies that correspond to the target [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] of the current project.
Docs.summary: Returns a collection of all the assemblies that have been loaded in the environment.
Docs.returns: A collection of all the assemblies that have been loaded in the environment.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Reflection.AssemblyName> GetEnvironmentAssemblyNames() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a collection that contains the assembly names of all the assemblies that have been loaded in the environment.
Docs.returns: A collection that contains the assembly names of all the assemblies that have been loaded in the environment.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the local assembly name.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the referenced assembly names.
